NVQ.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an examination relating to the skills and knowledge involved in a particular type of work. NVQs are taken in Britain, usually by people who are already working.
NVQ.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: National Vocational Qualification; a British qualification relating to the skills and knowledge involved in a particular type of work
NVQ.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: an NVQ Level II in Catering and Hospitality
